text:
="preserve">Joseph Raymond "Ray" Frenette (April 16, 1935 – July 13, 2018) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Beresford, New Brunswick. He was a Liberal representative for the riding of Moncton East in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick from 1974 until 1998. He retired after a short term as the 28th Premier of New Brunswick.
Frenette died on July 13, 2018 at the age of 83.
